patterns: Can you tell me the time?
responses: I don't have access to real-time data, but you can check the time on your device or ask your system.
I can't provide the current time, but it should be displayed on your computer or phone.
I don't have clock capabilities, but your device should show the current time.
For the current time, please check your device's clock or system time.
My internal clock isn't synchronized to a specific timezone. Please refer to your device.

patterns: Can you help me book something?
responses: I can't directly make bookings, but I can guide you on how to make reservations through appropriate channels.
For bookings, you'll need to contact the relevant service provider directly or use their booking system.
I can provide information about booking processes, but you'll need to make actual reservations through official channels.
I can't make bookings for you, but I can help you find the right contact information or booking platforms.
While I don't handle bookings myself, I can direct you to services that do.

patterns: I want to report an issue
responses: I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble. Can you tell me more about the issue so I can try to help?
I understand your frustration. Let me see how I can assist you with this problem.
I'm here to help resolve your concern. Could you provide more details about what's not working?
I apologize for any inconvenience. Please let me know what specific issue you're experiencing.
I want to help you with this problem. Can you describe what's happening in more detail?
I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Please elaborate on what's bothering you.
I'm a chatbot service rather than a product seller. I can provide information and assistance with various topics.
I don't sell physical products, but I can help you with information, conversations, and answering questions.
My main 'product' is conversational assistance. I can help with questions, provide information, and chat with you.
I offer conversational AI services. I can answer questions, provide information, and assist with various topics.
I'm an AI assistant service. I can help with information, answer questions, and provide conversational support.
I specialize in providing information and support through conversation.

No worries! Ask me any question and I'll do my best to help.
I apologize, I didn't quite catch that. Could you try phrasing it differently?
Perhaps I can help if you give me a little more detail?
I'm having trouble understanding. Can you tell me what you're trying to achieve?

patterns: What's the status of my order?
Is my item on its way?
responses: Please provide your order number so I can check the status for you.
To check your order status, I'll need your order number. Could you please provide it?
I can help with that! What's your order number?
Once you give me your order number, I can tell you its current status.
Sure, tell me your order number and I'll look it up.
I need your order ID to track it. What is it?
Our standard delivery takes 3-5 business days. We also offer express options for an additional fee.
Shipping costs vary based on your location and the selected delivery speed. You can see the exact cost at checkout.
Yes, we offer express and next-day delivery options in select regions. Please check our shipping policy for details.
For international shipping, please refer to our website's shipping section, as rates and times differ by country.
Delivery details can be found on our shipping information page, or I can try to answer specific questions if you have them.

patterns: Do you have a feedback option?
Where do I leave a review?
responses: Yes, your feedback is very valuable! You can send your suggestions to feedback@example.com, or I can note it down for you if it's brief.
Absolutely! What kind of feedback would you like to provide? I'm always looking to improve.
We welcome all feedback! Please share your thoughts, and I'll make sure they are considered.
Thank you for wanting to give feedback! You can use our dedicated feedback form on our website or share it with me now.
Your input helps me get better! Please tell me what you think.

patterns: I want to talk to a human
I need to speak to a person
responses: I understand. I can connect you to a human agent during our business hours. Please hold while I transfer you.
Certainly! Please wait a moment while I find an available representative for you.
If you'd prefer to speak with a person, I can arrange that. What is your primary concern so I can direct you to the right department?
Connecting you to a live agent now. Please be ready to briefly explain your issue again.
Our human agents are available from [START_TIME] to [END_TIME]. Would you like to be connected now, or would you prefer to leave a message?
